name: Alpine Crawler Wild
description:
Alpine Crawler Wild is an Off Road simulation with real-time physics.

Features:
- 3 game modes (Free Ride, Time Trial, Challenge)
- 9 cars/trucks
- 3 terrains/locations
- 30 exciting and hard levels (10 per country)
- different weather and day-night conditions (day, night, dawn, rain)
- visual effects (car-lights, car-colours, dirt)
- 5 playable drivers (both male and female)
- you can listen to music with iMusical while playing
- unique and smooth gameplay
- openfeint high-score list with many aspects
- optimized for 3rd and 4th generation devices (smooth gameplay at 60fps)
- retina display on 4th generation devices

App Review:
http://www.148apps.com/reviews/alpine-crawler-wild-review/
